subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Steroids
Tests and Testing
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador said that he would not stand for any punishment for failing a drug test last summer and that he was upset that cycling officials accepted his defense yet still wanted to bar him.
snippet: Alberto Contador said that he would not stand for any punishment for failing a drug test last summer and that he was upset that cycling officials accepted his defense yet still wanted to bar him.
